articles.title: Harmanpreet Kaur May Get 2-Game Suspension For Angry Behaviour In ODI vs Bangladesh, May Miss Asian Games Matches: Report | Cricket News - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Harmanpreet Kaur could well miss first two games in the upcoming Hangzhou Asian Games on charges of equipment abuse and public criticism of match officials after the tied third ODI against Bangladesh on Saturday
